name: Transfer Teacher
description:
"happiness"

In Transfer Teacher into the snowy season, into the uneventful life of Lee one day comes she, the exchange professor from J-Country. Not only beautiful, but also passionate… about teaching.

This This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2005-03-28. The writing, production and direction was done by mikey. The art was done by Kathryn. The engine was created by Jet. Music was composed by base and mikey. Estimated completion time is 1 hour.

Transfer Teacher is game Nr. 6 of the Original 22.
